data.name: Info_CreateAccount
data.value: To create a user account, click 'New user...' to go to the website

data.name: Info_DownloadArea
data.value: The Download Area is where you can download and share profiles with other Keysticks users.{0}{0}All users can download profiles. Remember to preview the controls before using them to understand what they do.{0}{0}If you log in using your {1} user account, you can also add your own profiles to the Download Area.{0}{0}For more information, see the \"Downloading profiles\" and \"Sharing profiles\" topics in the Help file.

data.value: Here, you can log in using your {0} username or email address. Once you have logged in, you will be able to add your own profiles to the Download Area.
